mod_info.title: Bowser's Castle
mod_info.subtitle: By Drew629
mod_info.description:
Features:
-9 Characters from the Super Mario series
-Buyable Ending
-Moon style boss
-Hellhounds and mixed rounds
-Map themed mini game
-7 song easter eggs
-12 perks
-Custom boss fights
-Custom double packing
-Custom special round
-Custom special grenade

Credits:
The Models Resource – Character models
The Textures Resource – HUD elements, ingame textures
MrCoby220 – Raygun Mark II
bamskater33 – Black Ops 1 & 2 perks, shaders
Paragalor – boss zombie script
TomBMX – Gun models
Wraith – Gun animations
mod_info.game: Call of Duty: World at War
